argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | uridm.1 | |- H = ( 2nd ` R ) |
| 2 |  | uridm.2 | |- X = ran ( 1st ` R ) |
| 3 |  | uridm2.2 | |- U = ( GId ` H ) |
| 4 | 1, 2, 3 | #P_rngoidmlem | |- ( ( R e. RingOps /\ A e. X ) -> ( ( U H A ) = A /\ ( A H U ) = A ) ) |
| 5 | 4 | #P_simprd | |- ( ( R e. RingOps /\ A e. X ) -> ( A H U ) = A ) |
